episodes.title: Katie Boyle
episodes.description: Doug welcomes pagan Irish comic Katie Boyle to the show to discuss superstitions, near death experiences, and eating a cat’s nuts. They speak a little differently across the pond so get out your glossary and strap in for some good crack! Check out her podcast The Shift on all platforms. | Katie |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @katieboylecomicWebsite: katieboylecomic.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the Show & Bonus Content: https://www.patreon.com/jehovahboyEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by  @doctorphotograph Support the show

episodes.title: Usama Siddiquee
episodes.description: Doug welcomes hilarious comedian and actor Usama Siddiquee to the show to discuss his Muslim upbringing and complete ignorance of the opposite sex. It wasn’t till he moved to NYC to immerse himself in club drugs and one night stands that he found true enlightenment. Check out his podcast Mango Bae available on all platforms! | Usama |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @usamastandsupWebsite: usamastandsup.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Olga Namer
episodes.description: Doug welcomes comedian and former Orthodox Jew Olga Namer to the show! As the black sheep of her devout family, she still serves as an asset, flipping light switches and changing channels for her parents on Shabbat. Her attempts to embrace life on the outside are peppered with all the guilt, shame and fear of a sheltered upbringing, but Doug encourages her to lean into the rebellion with a little shoplifting. | Olga |Instagram: @olganamerWebsite: olganamer.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Kevin James Doyle
episodes.description: Doug welcomes friend and fellow comic, the solo show aficionado himself, Kevin James Doyle to the show! A product of a squeaky clean Christian upbringing, Kevin abstained from immorality (nuthin' but butt stuff 'till the age of 30) in an effort to save himself for marriage. When his bride-to-be breaks his heart he rebounds with a foreign straphanger, only to endure an outbreak so vicious, there was no doubt it was retribution from above. Make sure to check out all 3 of Kevin’s new specials dropping in 2024!| Kevin |Instagram: @kevinjamesdoyleWebsite: kevinjamesdoyle.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Doug Gets Converted
episodes.description: Doug welcomes a real live Christian pastor to the show! Pastor Caleb Clardy from Trinity Grace Church in Brooklyn, NY explains what makes a church non-denominational, why he isn’t covered in bad tattoos, and how some righteous merch might rope in some newcomers. He even entices Doug to attend a service with the promise of a post-sermon dodgeball game and an artisanal pickle from the neighboring farmers market.| Pastor Caleb |Instagram: @trinitygracechurchFacebook: tgcparkslope| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Dina Hashem
episodes.description: Doug welcomes hilarious NYC comic Dina Hashem to the show! Though raised Muslim in suburban NJ, Doug and Dina had a parallel upbringing… overbearing mothers, a guilty conscience ruled by fear, and covering up a double life with the skill set of a CIA operative. Check out Dina’s debut standup special, “Dark Little Whispers” now streaming on Amazon Prime. | Dina |Instagram: @dinahashem_Website: dinahashem.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Matt Wayne | AMA #3
episodes.description: Doug welcomes comedian, actor, filmmaker, and best bud Matt Wayne to the show for an AMA that devolves into a beautiful disaster (311, anyone?). After covering sadistic Catholic school nuns and how to spot JWs in your neighborhood they get to the important issues… Forrest Gump’s giant hog, soiling your khakis, and the blatant homoeroticism of Ren & Stimpy. Check out Matt’s feature film “Solo Project” on Amazon Prime and keep an eye out for his upcoming standup special “Take A Sniff” dropping soon on his yet to be created YouTube channel! | Matt |Instagram: nowayneinhell| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Faith Before Family | Dear Doug #6
episodes.description: Doug responds to an email from a listener who was disfellowshipped at 17 and lost all contact with his devout JW mother. Even when his son was diagnosed with cancer, his mother put her faith before family, refusing to reestablish a relationship and confirming the fact that “worldly people” are without a doubt the biggest threat to the organization.| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Ian James Corlett
episodes.description:
Doug welcomes iconic voice over actor and ex-JW Ian James Corlett to the show. With an IMDb page longer than the Old Testament, Ian has voiced beloved cartoon characters for decades (Mega Man, Goku) while simultaneously serving as a Christian elder. When fellow elders in his congregation condemned him for his nanosecond role in Casper’s Haunted Christmas, he began to question his belief system and strategized an exit to ensure a brighter future for his wife and children. 
| Ian |
Instagram: ianjamescorlett
Website: ianjamescorlett.com


| Doug |
Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmith
Website: dougsmithcomedy.com

Join the Patreon!
Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.com

episodes.title: Amber Scorah
episodes.description: Doug welcomes ex-JW author Amber Scorah to the show to discuss her book Leaving the Witness: Exiting a Religion and Finding a Life. After being disfellowshipped as a teenager for sexual immorality, Amber reimmersed herself in the organization, relocating to China to preach undercover amidst the threat of religious persecution. When her life in the truth was exposed as a web of lies, she plotted her final exit, only to have her entry into the real world upended by tragedy.| Amber |Instagram: @amberscorahWebsite: amberscorah.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Ask Me Anything #2
episodes.description: Doug takes a deep dive on JW weddings… the bland ceremony, the terrible music, and the horny young virgins who just want the whole thing to be over with so they can finally get down to business. | Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Kurt Metzger
episodes.description: Doug finally lands his dream guest and welcomes ex-JW comedian Kurt Metzger to the show! They cover a whole lot of ground from the #metoo and BLM movements, to Jeffrey Epstein, to the conspiracy theory that Neil deGrasse Tyson is an undercover Jehovah’s Witness. Check out Kurt’s new standup special 30 Minutes with Kurt Metzger (presented by GaS Digital) out now on his YouTube channel! | Kurt |Instagram: @kurtmetzgercomedyTwitter: @kurtmetzger Website: kurtmetzgercomedy.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Dear Doug #4 (Doug Reads an Email)
episodes.description: Doug responds to a listener email. This ex-JW golden boy had good looks and athletic ability up the wazoo but it almost all went to waste. Forced to turn away from female attention and fight gay allegations all through high school, he balled his way to a division one scholarship despite his disapproving mothers attempts to sideline him. | Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Aaron Kaufman
episodes.description: Doug welcomes ex-JW filmmaker Aaron Kaufman to the show to discuss “Crusaders”, his Vice documentary that exposes the dark underbelly of the world’s most powerful doomsday cult. Featuring interviews with leading cult experts, prosecuting attorneys, and victims of abuse, the doc explores rampant pedophilia within the organization and the multimillion-dollar effort to cover it up. His newest doc (co-directed with Sean Penn) about the Ukraine conflict, “Superpower”, premiers on Paramount+ 9/18.| Aaron |Instagram: @aaronkkaufmanIMDB: aaron kaufmanCrusaders on Vice TV| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Fish Scales (from Nappy Roots)
episodes.description: Doug welcomes Nappy Roots’ very own Fish Scales to the show! As a career rapper with a brewmaster side hustle, his current lifestyle never would have been possible had he remained under the thumb of the JW organization. Thanks to a basketball scholarship and a college education, Scales quickly saw the fallacies of their belief system and courageously left to find his true calling.| Scales |Instagram: @nappyscalesYouTube: @nappyrootstvSpotify: nappy rootsatlantucky brewingnappyroots.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Dear Doug #3 (Doug Reads an Email)
episodes.description: Doug responds to an email from a listener who was raised JW and Catholic AT THE SAME TIME! Caught in a crossfire of feuding parents, the religious tug of war led to double the indoctrination, double the depression, and an uphill battle to break free from the chaos. | Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Randy Savagery
episodes.description: Doug welcomes comedian, podcaster, and fellow ex-JW Randy Savagery to the show! As a kid with a non-believer dad, Randy experienced all the joys of holidays, video games, girls and more, but not without a strict Bible thumping mom to even things out. | Randy |YouTube: @randysavagerycomedypodcastFacebook: randall anthony meilbeckInstagram: @randysavageryshow"X": @randysavagerySpotify: randy savagery showLinkedIn: randy savagery show| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Dear Doug #2 (Doug Reads Your Emails)
episodes.description: Doug responds to listener emails! He compares notes on dodging kids from school when going door to door before taking a deep dive on the ramifications of refusing blood transfusions.| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Mike Finoia
episodes.description: Doug welcomes comedian and fellow Connecticut boy Mike Finoia to the show. They discuss their parents paranoid fear of demon possession, the “devil music” that they banned, and Mike’s dream gig of hosting a podcast with the bass player from Dead & Co.Check out Mike’s podcast Comes a Time and his upcoming special "Don’t Let Me Down" on his YouTube channel.| Mike |Instagram: @mikefinoiaYouTube: @mikefinoiaWebsite: mikefinoia.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Ask Me Anything (with guest Mark Buzzee)
episodes.description: Doug invites childhood friend/fellow ex-JW, Mark Buzzee, to the studio to tackle their first AMA together. They field questions about windows, money, and the most famous Jehoavah's Witnesses on Earth.| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Dear Doug #1 (Doug Reads Your Emails)
episodes.description: Solo episode! Doug finally combs through his inbox and responds to listener emails about sobriety, preaching in war torn countries, and failing to plan for a real future after putting all your chips on Armageddon| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comJoin the Patreon!Email the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Casey James Salengo
episodes.description: Doug reflects on common JW misconceptions and school dance rejections before catching up with comedian and fellow late bloomer, Casey James Salengo.They discuss impoverished living with criminal parents, shrunken testicles and humiliating interactions with the opposite sex, and feigning a deep voice as a teen after getting confused for a girl. | Casey |Instagram: @caseyjsalengoTik Tok: @caseyjsalengoTwitter: @caseyjsalengoFacebook: Casey James Salengo| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Aaron Putnam
episodes.description: Doug ponders the idea of a Jehovah's Witness Rumspringa to retain membership before catching up with comedian and our first official ex-JW, Aaron Putnam. They trade war stories about failing to keep a low profile in school, having nowhere to channel your raging hormones, and training for standup since the age of 7.| Aaron |Instagram: @comic_aaronputnamTik Tok: @comicaaronputnamFacebook: Aaron Putnam ComedyWebsite: aaronputnamlive.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Zach Zimmerman
episodes.description: Doug reflects on rampant homophobia in the JW community and the people in his congregation who were forced to live a lie before catching up with comedian and author, Zach Zimmerman. They discuss Christian fearmongering tactics, catastrophic thinking, and the special place in hell for people who sample ice cream without buying any. Zach’s new book “Is It Hot in Here (Or Am I Suffering for All Eternity for the Sins I Committed on Earth)?” is available now! | Zach |Instagram: @zzdoublezzTwitter: @zzdoublezzTik Tok: @zzdoublezzWebsite: www.zach-zimmerman.com/| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Christi Chiello
episodes.description: Doug reflects on fear of a vengeful god and his own personal security detail before catching up with another fellow member of the dead mom club, comedian and friend of Jesus, Christi Chiello. They discuss desperate social media ploys, wavering faith after experiencing loss, and divulging too much about your family on stage. | Christi |Instagram: @christichielloTik Tok: @christichielloWebsite: https://www.christichiello.com/| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Ophira Eisenberg
episodes.description: Doug reflects on embarrassing injuries and the curse of freak accidents among Smith men before catching up with comedian/mom/host of the hit podcast “Parenting is a Joke," Ophira Eisenberg.They discuss hurt feelings and humiliation at the hands of your own children, dumb platitudes people use to make sense of tragedy, and the numerous incidents that inspired her new show “Leaving a Mark: A Show About Scars.”| Ophira |Instagram: @ophiraeTik Tok: @ophiranycTwitter: @ophiraeFacebook: Ophira EisenbergWebsite: https://www.ophiraeisenberg.com/| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Evan Williams
episodes.description: Doug reflects on his mom’s crusade to control his intake of secular entertainment and drag him along in the door to door ministry before catching up with comedian, actor, and reluctant TikTok star Evan Williams.After suffering multiple devastating losses at a young age, Evan’s teenage addiction comes as no surprise. But when weekday benders lead to a half dozen car wrecks and close calls with the law, the path to sobriety was a matter of life and death. Despite his gratitude for recovery and all the rewards that come with it, Evan admits the JW mission statement is slightly tempting.| Evan |Instagram: @itsevanwilliamsTik Tok: @itsevanwilliamsTwitter: @itsevanwilliamsWebsite: https://evanwilliamscomedy.com/ | Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Alison Leiby
episodes.description: Doug reminisces about forbidden birthday cupcakes and blood transfusions before catching up with comedian/writer/hardest working woman in showbiz Alison Leiby about her off-Broadway hit, “Oh God, A Show About Abortion”. They discuss the inconvenience of scheduling an abortion, finding forgiveness and compassion for your parents, and bombing your way to greatness. | Alison |Instagram: @AlisonLeibyTwitter: @AlisonLeiby"Oh God, A Show About Abortion" at The Kennedy Center (June 20-24) | Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Phil Hanley
episodes.description: Doug reflects on the crippling boredom of JW meetings and his sacrilegious attempt to pass the time before catching up with comedian Phil Hanley about his new special “Ooh La La” and his lifelong struggle with dyslexia. They discuss the tedious trends of crowdwork videos and psychedelic wellness, the antiquated  standards of the school system, and gratitude for all things learning disabilities can empower you with. | Phil |Instagram: @PhilMHanleyTwitter: @PhilMHanleyTikTok: @PhilHanley YouTube: @PhilHanley2393Website: http://www.philhanley.com/| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Casey Balsham
episodes.description: Doug shares the harrowing tale of his wife’s failed home birth and the NICU nurses who saved his son’s life before catching up with the hilarious Casey Balsham about impending parenthood. They discuss the physical and financial hell of IVF treatments, detoxing from social media addiction, and prepping your kids for the robot takeover. | Casey |Instagram: @Casefaceb Twitter: @CaseyBalsham TikTok: @Casefaceb Snapchat: LawlessWebsite: http://www.caseybalsham.com/| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Chris Gethard
episodes.description: Doug shares his experience of moving to NYC to be a drunken harlot before finally chasing his standup dreams, but not before dipping a toe in the world of improv with his former teacher and this week’s guest, Chris Gethard.They discuss the terrors of witnessing your child’s head trauma over FaceTime, the prospect of ending up as t-shirt salesmen, and how peer criticism can unfortunately outweigh fan support.| Chris |Instagram: @chrisgethTwitter: @chrisgethardFacebook: Chris GethardWebsite: www.chrisgeth.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmithWebsite: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show

episodes.title: Ari Shaffir
episodes.description: Doug shares his origin story as a former Jehovah’s Witness and compares notes on a strict religious upbringing with comedian and former Orthodox Jew, Ari Shaffir. They reflect on how rituals and discipline shaped them while discussing Jesus getting sunburned, ridiculous songs of worship, and how to survive the rapture.| Ari |Instagram & YouTube: @arishaffir Website: www.arishaffir.com| Doug |Instagram, Twitter, Tik Tok & YouTube: @whodougsmith Website: www.dougsmithcomedy.comEmail the show: jehovahboypodcast@gmail.comProduced by @doctorphotographSupport the show
